channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.5.2
item.description:
We now include the address_standardizer extension again, which was accidentally missing since PostgreSQL 12.

This update also supports running PostgreSQL 13 and 14 on macOS 10.12 again.

This update includes the following versions of PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.24 with PostGIS 2.3.11
  • PostgreSQL 10.19 with PostGIS 2.4.9
  • PostgreSQL 11.14 with PostGIS 2.5.5
  • PostgreSQL 12.9 with PostGIS 3.0.4
  • PostgreSQL 13.5 with PostGIS 3.1.4
  • PostgreSQL 14.1 with PostGIS 3.1.4

This is the final release for PostgreSQL 9.6. If you are still have a database using 9.6, consider migrating to a newer version. The next update of Postgres.app will no longer include PostgreSQL 9.6.
